name: Pyxel Knight - Engagement Quest
summary:
Pyxel Knight is a 1-4 player side scrolling pixel art platformer about a up and coming hero
Pyxel, who is an aspiring adventurer who wants to be a hero and save the kingdom of Pixaria.
storyline: Pyxel is an aspiring adventurer who wants to be a hero and save the kingdom of Pixaria. The royal family of Pixaria was ambushed by an unknown group and only the king made it out alive. The king has offered his kingdom to any of the townsfolk who could get married to royalty. Pyxel sees this as his chance to become a real knight and ventures off against his father's wishes to save a princess from the dungeon. Little does he know how fickle and picky the princesses are he is off to rescue. No amount of rejection will stop Pyxel from trying to save the day.
